languages.text: "А внутри? Полифоры высотой в десяток этажей и длиной в километр! Циклопические световые колодцы, улавливающие свет Фурибундуса и освещающие им залы в сердце астероидов! Витражи и мозаики, барельефы и статуи!" {n}Увлекшись, Гордей привстает и одной рукой выводит в воздухе очертания арок и галерей.{/n}

"And the interior! Poliforas ten stories tall and more than a kilometre long! Cyclopean light tubes that catch the light of Furibundus and use it to brighten the halls in the hearts of the asteroids! Stained glass windows and mosaics, bas-reliefs and statues!" {n}Engrossed in his own description, Gordei stands up and starts tracing the outlines of arches and galleries with his hand.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А внутри? Полифоры высотой в десяток этажей и длиной в километр! Циклопические световые колодцы, улавливающие свет Фурибундуса и освещающие им залы в сердце астероидов! Витражи и мозаики, барельефы и статуи!" {n}Увлекшись, Гордей привстает и одной рукой выводит в воздухе очертания арок и галерей.{/n}

Stained glass windows and mosaics, bas-reliefs and statues!" {n}Engrossed in his own description, Gordei stands up and starts tracing the outlines of arches and galleries with his hand.{/n}

Stained glass windows and mosaics, bas-reliefs and statues!" {n}Engrossed in his own description, Gordei stands up and starts tracing the outlines of arches and galleries with his hand.{/n}

languages.text: 「屋内だって負けていません！高さ10階建て、長さ1キロメートル以上の複合窓！フリブンダスの光を取り込み小惑星の中心にある広間を明るく照らすサイクロプス方式の照明チューブ！ステンドグラス、モザイク、浮き彫りに彫像も！」{n}ゴーディは自分の説明に夢中になると、立ち上がり、アーチや回廊の輪郭を手でなぞり始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And the interior! Poliforas ten stories tall and more than a kilometre long! Cyclopean light tubes that catch the light of Furibundus and use it to brighten the halls in the hearts of the asteroids! Stained glass windows and mosaics, bas-reliefs and statues!" {n}Engrossed in his own description, Gordei stands up and starts tracing the outlines of arches and galleries with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「屋内だって負けていません！高さ10階建て、長さ1キロメートル以上の複合窓！フリブンダスの光を取り込み小惑星の中心にある広間を明るく照らすサイクロプス方式の照明チューブ！ステンドグラス、モザイク、浮き彫りに彫像も！」{n}ゴーディは自分の説明に夢中になると、立ち上がり、アーチや回廊の輪郭を手でなぞり始める。{/n}

languages.text: “它的内部更是惊人！里面有足足十层楼高，有长达一公里的大面积排窗！巨大的光管会捕捉怒焰星的明光，照亮位于小行星正中心的大厅！还有彩色玻璃窗、马赛克瓷画、浅浮雕和塑像！”{n}戈尔代沉浸在自己的描述之中。他站起身来，开始用手描绘拱门与走廊的轮廓。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And the interior! Poliforas ten stories tall and more than a kilometre long! Cyclopean light tubes that catch the light of Furibundus and use it to brighten the halls in the hearts of the asteroids! Stained glass windows and mosaics, bas-reliefs and statues!" {n}Engrossed in his own description, Gordei stands up and starts tracing the outlines of arches and galleries with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “它的内部更是惊人！里面有足足十层楼高，有长达一公里的大面积排窗！巨大的光管会捕捉怒焰星的明光，照亮位于小行星正中心的大厅！还有彩色玻璃窗、马赛克瓷画、浅浮雕和塑像！”{n}戈尔代沉浸在自己的描述之中。他站起身来，开始用手描绘拱门与走廊的轮廓。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Y ese interior! ¡Políforas de diez pisos de altura y más de un kilómetro de longitud! ¡Tubos de luz ciclópeos que captan la luz de Furibundus y la utilizan para iluminar las salas dentro de los asteroides! ¡Vidrieras y mosaicos, bajorrelieves y estatuas!». {n}Gordei, ensimismado en su propia descripción, se levanta y empieza a trazar con la mano los contornos de los distintos arcos y galerías.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And the interior! Poliforas ten stories tall and more than a kilometre long! Cyclopean light tubes that catch the light of Furibundus and use it to brighten the halls in the hearts of the asteroids! Stained glass windows and mosaics, bas-reliefs and statues!" {n}Engrossed in his own description, Gordei stands up and starts tracing the outlines of arches and galleries with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Y ese interior! ¡Políforas de diez pisos de altura y más de un kilómetro de longitud! ¡Tubos de luz ciclópeos que captan la luz de Furibundus y la utilizan para iluminar las salas dentro de los asteroides! ¡Vidrieras y mosaicos, bajorrelieves y estatuas!». {n}Gordei, ensimismado en su propia descripción, se levanta y empieza a trazar con la mano los contornos de los distintos arcos y galerías.{/n}

languages.text: « Et je ne vous parle pas de l'intérieur... Des fenêtres hautes de dix étages et longues de plus d'un kilomètre ! Des tubes de lumière gigantesques qui captent la lumière de Furibundus pour éclairer les bâtiments situés au cœur des astéroïdes ! Des vitraux, des mosaïques, des bas-reliefs, des statues ! » {n}Pris par son envolée lyrique, Gordei se lève et commence à esquisser de la main les contours d'arches et de galeries.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And the interior! Poliforas ten stories tall and more than a kilometre long! Cyclopean light tubes that catch the light of Furibundus and use it to brighten the halls in the hearts of the asteroids! Stained glass windows and mosaics, bas-reliefs and statues!" {n}Engrossed in his own description, Gordei stands up and starts tracing the outlines of arches and galleries with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et je ne vous parle pas de l'intérieur... Des fenêtres hautes de dix étages et longues de plus d'un kilomètre ! Des tubes de lumière gigantesques qui captent la lumière de Furibundus pour éclairer les bâtiments situés au cœur des astéroïdes ! Des vitraux, des mosaïques, des bas-reliefs, des statues ! » {n}Pris par son envolée lyrique, Gordei se lève et commence à esquisser de la main les contours d'arches et de galeries.{/n}

languages.text: "Und das Innere erst! Zehnstöckige Poliforas, mehr als einen Kilometer lang! Zyklopische Lichtröhren, die das Licht von Furibundus einfangen und damit die Hallen in den Herzen der Asteroiden erleuchten! Buntglasfenster und Mosaike, Flachreliefs und Statuen!" {n}Hingerissen von seiner eigenen Beschreibung, steht Gordei auf und zeichnet die Umrisse von Bögen und Galerien mit der Hand in die Luft.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And the interior! Poliforas ten stories tall and more than a kilometre long! Cyclopean light tubes that catch the light of Furibundus and use it to brighten the halls in the hearts of the asteroids! Stained glass windows and mosaics, bas-reliefs and statues!" {n}Engrossed in his own description, Gordei stands up and starts tracing the outlines of arches and galleries with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und das Innere erst! Zehnstöckige Poliforas, mehr als einen Kilometer lang! Zyklopische Lichtröhren, die das Licht von Furibundus einfangen und damit die Hallen in den Herzen der Asteroiden erleuchten! Buntglasfenster und Mosaike, Flachreliefs und Statuen!" {n}Hingerissen von seiner eigenen Beschreibung, steht Gordei auf und zeichnet die Umrisse von Bögen und Galerien mit der Hand in die Luft.{/n}

languages.text: "İçiyse bambaşka! On kat yüksekliğinde, bir kilometre uzunluğunda polifora pencereler! Furibundus'un ışığını yakalayıp asteroitlerin kalbindeki salonları aydınlatmakta kullanan devasa ışık tüpleri! Vitray camlı pencereler ve mozaikler, bas rölyef ve heykeller!" {n}Kendi tasvirlerine kapılıp giden Gordei, ayağa kalkıp eliyle kemer ve galerilerin ana hatlarını çizmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And the interior! Poliforas ten stories tall and more than a kilometre long! Cyclopean light tubes that catch the light of Furibundus and use it to brighten the halls in the hearts of the asteroids! Stained glass windows and mosaics, bas-reliefs and statues!" {n}Engrossed in his own description, Gordei stands up and starts tracing the outlines of arches and galleries with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İçiyse bambaşka! On kat yüksekliğinde ve bir kilometre uzunluğunda polifora türü pencereler! Furibundus ışığını alıp, gök taşlarının merkezindeki salonları aydınlatmakta kullanan devasa ışık tüpleri! Vitray camlı pencereler ve mozaikler, bas rölyef ve heykeller!" {n}Kendi tasvirlerine kendini kaptıran Gordei, ayağa kalkıp eliyle kemerlerle galerilerin ana hatlarını çizmeye başlıyor.{/n}
